contentrichtext.text: {{Japanese city |Name = Kanra |JapaneseName = 甘楽町 |settlement_type = Town |Prefecture = [[Gunma Prefecture]] |Region = [[Kantō region|Kantō]] |Area_km2 = 58.57 |Population = 14,119 |PopDate = September 1, 2007 |Density_km2 = 241.06 |Coords = {{coord|36|15|N|138|55|E|region:JP_type:city}} |LatitudeDegrees = 36 |LatitudeMinutes = 15 |LatitudeSeconds = |LongtitudeDegrees = 138 |LongtitudeMinutes = 55 |LongtitudeSeconds = |Postal code = |Area code = |Mayor = |Tree = [[Japanese Red Pine]] |Flower = [[Prunus × yedoensis]] |Bird = [[Green Pheasant]] |SymbolImage = |CityHallPostalCode = 370-2292 |CityHallAddress = Kanra-machi, 161-1 Ōaza Obata |CityHallPhone = 0274-74-3131 |CityHallLink = [http://www.town.kanra.gunma.jp/ Town of Kanra] |MapImage = Kanra in Gunma Prefecture Ja.svg |Elevation = }} {{nihongo|'''Kanra'''|甘楽町|Kanra-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kanra District, Gunma|Kanra District]], [[Gunma Prefecture|Gunma]], [[Japan]]. As of September 1, 2007, the town has an estimated [[population]] of 14,119 and a [[population density|density]] of 241.06 persons per km². The total area is 58.57 km². ==Surrounding municipalities== * [[Gunma Prefecture]] ** [[Fujioka, Gunma|Fujioka]] ** [[Takasaki, Gunma|Takasaki]] ** [[Tomioka, Gunma|Tomioka]] ** [[Shimonita, Gunma|Shimonita]] ==History== * 1889-Obata village, Akihata village, Fukushima town, and Niiya village are created in Kitakanra District. * 1925-Obata village is turned into Obata town. * 1950-Kitakanra District's name is turned into [[Kanra District, Gunma|Kanra District]]. * 1955-Akihata village is merged into Obata town. * 1959-Fukushima village and Niiya village are merged into Obata town, creating Kanra town. ==Education== * [[Primary Schools]] ** Obata Elementary School ** Fukushima Elementary School ** Niiya Elementary School ** Akihata Elementary School *** Nasu Division * [[Junior High Schools]] ** Daiichi Junior High School ** Daini Junior High School ** Daisan Junior High School ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} * [http://www.town.kanra.gunma.jp/ Kanra official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Gunma Prefecture]] {{Gunma-geo-stub}}
